title: Emmanuel Acho
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with ex NFL linebacker, Fox Sports analyst, and host of 'Uncomfortable conversations with a black man,' Emmanuel Acho. They discuss the power of social media, being authentic, and uncovering the why behind people's beliefs.  
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
